pageContext.claim: “Now that they're rationing water for people, they're saying you're going to get, very shortly -- I heard the governor [of California] saying you get 50 gallons.”
pageContext.analysis: California is not rationing water. Trump is mischaracterizing a new state law. Trump twists just enough to merit a fact check. California enacted a law limiting residents to 55 gallons of water use -- but that's per person, per day. The limit gradually decreases to 52.5 gallons in 2025 and 50 gallons in 2030.
